name: logjack
description:
A general-purpose logging API written in node.js, and based on log4js-node. Supports all log4js-node functionality, extending it to include JSON and XML output.

Object Definitions

Appenders

Write a simpler description of log4js-node appenders

Categories

Write a simpler description of log4js-node categories

Layouts

Write a simpler description of log4js-node layouts.
